web_snippets: Co-founder and CTO Calitii Ltd · Experience: Calitii · Location: United Kingdom · 500+ connections on LinkedIn. View Sukhi Gill's profile on LinkedIn, ...
Sukhi Gill, former DXC Technology VP, Fellow and Chief Technology Officer (EMEA), has as of 1 st October 2023, been appointed by Calitii as Co-founder and CTO.
Sukhi Gill is a seasoned technology leader currently serving as Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer at Calitii since October 2023.
